transcript: : How can AI-driven insights inform strategic decision-making in today's volatile business environments?: Let's see what the skeptic has to say.: AI can definitely provide broad knowledge, but it often lacks the deep industry-specific nuances that human experts bring to the table.__silence: Also, AI suggestions are only as good as the data it's trained on, which can lead to biases or outdated information affecting your decisions.: One of the frequent misconceptions of GPTs is that it's- that the only thing you get back is parroting of the data that's put in versus synthesis and actually new things.: And, and so it's entertaining that the skeptic AI is actually wrong about AI.: What I find these GPTs to be stunning at is their- the breadth of applying kind of theoretical, uh, analyses or general principles very good.: When it gets to specifics is when you definitely, today, need the human in the loop- Yeah.: to go, "Is this one right?
description: A conversation with the Skeptic GPT #ai #technology
